title: Support adding /bl via an environment variable
body:
I vaguely remember @danmoseley talking about a way to specify MSBuild command-line switches via an environment variable. I can't remember if this is supported or not, so filing an issue just in case.

It would be useful to turn on binlog via an environment variable.

nodes.body:
I honestly think MSBuildDebugEngine=1 solves this problem:
https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/blob/e868d91a40fb59cd258844a8d31114c1c3fabf2a/documentation/wiki/Building-Testing-and-Debugging-on-Full-Framework-MSBuild.md#logs
